Package com.intellij.openapi.editor.event

Interface EditorEventMulticaster

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    EditorEventMulticasterEx
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EditorEventMulticasterImpl

    public interface EditorEventMulticaster
    Allows to attach listeners which receive notifications about changes in any currently open editor.
    See Also:
    EditorFactory.getEventMulticaster()
